content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.reconconsignment') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.reconconsignment
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.reconconsignment (
[v1id] int,
[v1CRef] nvarchar(4000),
[v1CDate] datetime2(7),
[v1UserID] int,
[v1Appointment] datetime2(7),
[v1DeliverBy] datetime2(7),
[v1DConfirmed] nvarchar(4000),
[v1DComment] nvarchar(4000),
[v1DRefNo] nvarchar(4000),
[v1DUserID] int,
[v1LoadID] int,
[v1DeliverCustID] int,
[v1mrpCFlag] int,
[v1mrpFlag] int,
[v1ChargeWeight] numeric(36,6),
[v1VolumetricWeight] numeric(36,6),
[v1NoOfParcels] int,
[v1Weight] numeric(36,6),
[v1CustAccID] int,
[v1MinKg] numeric(36,6),
[v1MinRate] numeric(36,6),
[v1AddRate] numeric(36,6),
[v1DocFees] numeric(36,6),
[v1Charge] numeric(36,6),
[v1FuelLevy] numeric(36,6),
[v1TotFuelLevy] numeric(36,6),
[v1BillCust] int,
[v1TotalCharge] numeric(36,6),
[v1Units] int,
[v1xFromCustID] int,
[v1Scanned] int,
[v1ConsConsignID] int,
[v1ApptCode] nvarchar(4000),
[v1FinalInservice] int,
[v1DeliverByOriginal] datetime2(7),
[v1Bill_ServiceType] int,
[v1ConsignmentValue] numeric(36,6),
[v1TripDistance] numeric(36,6),
[v1Endorsement] nvarchar(4000),
[v1InServiceReasonID] int,
[v1InServiceComment] nvarchar(4000),
[v1ReturnFlag] int,
[v1CallProgID] int,
[v1CallProgUpdDate] datetime2(7),
[v1CServiceID] nvarchar(4000),
[v1LastUpdate] datetime2(7),
[v1BillFlag] int,
[v1MissingFlag] int,
[v1RouteRateID] int,
[v1OverBorderFlag] int,
[v1CollectID] int,
[v1BillUserID] int,
[v1SpecDel] int,
[v1QuoteFlag] int,
[v1VehicleTypeID] int,
[v1DeliverTypeID] int,
[v1BillTypeID] int,
[v1TotOtherSurcharges] numeric(36,6),
[v1LHAddRate] numeric(36,6),
[v1LHCharge] numeric(36,6),
[v1SAPBillPeriodID] int,
[v1LHRouteRateID] int,
[v1TotCovidSurcharges] numeric(36,6),
[v1BillPeriod] nvarchar(4000),
[v1BillWeek] int,
[v2id] bigint,
[v2customerid] bigint,
[v2puid] bigint,
[v2delid] bigint,
[v2manifestid] bigint,
[v2serviceid] bigint,
[v2servicename] nvarchar(4000),
[v2costcenterid] bigint,
[v2costcenter] nvarchar(4000),
[v2pickuprouteid] bigint,
[v2deliverrouteid] bigint,
[v2distributiontype] nvarchar(4000),
[v2consigndate] bigint,
[v2status] nvarchar(4000),
[v2cref] nvarchar(4000),
[v2cref2] nvarchar(4000),
[v2cref3] nvarchar(4000),
[v2cref4] nvarchar(4000),
[v2volweight] float,
[v2chargeweight] float,
[v2value] int,
[v2numpcls] int,
[v2units] int,
[v2batchdelivery] int,
[v2sapid] bigint,
[v2insdate] bigint,
[v2moddate] bigint,
[v2insby] int,
[v2legacyid] bigint,
[v2billtypeid] int,
[v2totothersurcharges] int,
[v2lhaddrate] int,
[v2lhcharge] int,
[v2billperiod] nvarchar(4000),
[v2billweek] int,
[v2minkg] float,
[v2minrate] int,
[v2addrate] int,
[v2docfees] int,
[v2charge] int,
[v2fuellevy] int,
[v2missingflag] int,
[v2qouteflag] int,
[v2vehicletypeid] int,
[v2redflag] int,
[v2samedeliverid] int,
[v2combineroutecharge] int,
[v2samedelcount] int,
[v2serviceratetype] nvarchar(4000),
[v2migrationstatus] nvarchar(4000),
[v2customername] nvarchar(4000),
[v2puname] nvarchar(4000),
[v2delname] nvarchar(4000),
[v2weight] float,
[v2overborder] int,
[v2vehicletype] nvarchar(4000),
[v2masterconsignid] int,
[v2masterconsignflag] int,
[v2legacypickuprouteid] int,
[v2legacydeliverrouteid] int,
[v2type] nvarchar(4000),
[notinv2] int,
[v2consigndatedate] datetime2(7),
[v2legacymanifestid] bigint,


	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Structured Data/LMSV2/reconconsignment.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.reconconsignment 
GO
